Package edu.um.cps2002.tile_game

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Game
    The Game class performs all the logic of the game, taking care of the setting up of players, all interactions between the players and the map, and the generation of HTML code.
    GameTest
    The GameTest class tests the functionality of methods in the Game class.
    HazardousMap
    The HazardousMap class is a Map object, with the implementation of the method HazardousMap.generate() which randomly creates a game map with grass and 25%--35% water tiles, and one treasure tile.
    HazardousMapTest
    The HazardousMapTest class tests the functionality of methods in the HazardousMap class.
    Launcher
    The Launcher class contains the main method, which creates an instance of Game and loops through gameplay rounds until someone wins.
    Map
    The Map class contains a two-dimensional array of Tiles and some simple methods that operate on the map.
    MapCreator
    The MapCreator class creates an appropriate Map using a given parameter (factory method design pattern).
    MapCreatorTest
    The MapCreatorTest class tests the functionality of methods in the MapCreator class.
    Observer
    The Observer class is an abstract class used to implement the observer design pattern.
    Player
    The Player class contains methods that have to do with the player's position in the map.
    PlayerTest
    The PlayerTest class tests the functionality of methods in the Player class.
    SafeMap
    The SafeMap class is a Map object, with the implementation of the method SafeMap.generate() which randomly creates a game map with grass and at most 10% water tiles, and one treasure tile.
    SafeMapTest
    The SafeMapTest class tests the functionality of methods in the SafeMap class.
    Subject
    The Subject class is an abstract class used to implement the observer design pattern.
    Team
    The Team class is an subclass of the Subject class and represents teams of players.
    TeamTest
    The TeamTest class tests the functionality of methods in the Team class.
    Tile
    The Tile class represents a tile on the map.
